00022 #ifndef FILEINBRED_H
00023 #define FILEINBRED_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/InbredStatus.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 //
00033 
00034 /**
00035  * @brief Read sample covariate relative inbreeding level assignments from file
00036  */
00037 class FileInbred : public InbredStatus {
00038 
00039 public:
00040 
00041   /**
00042    * Constructor. Reads file with inbreeding level.
00043    * @param inbredFile - the inbreeding file to read. must have cel_files, and inbred_het_penalty columns
00044    * @param celFiles   - the cel files names expected
00045    */
00046   FileInbred(const std::string &inbredFile, const std::vector<std::string> &celFiles);
00047 
00048   /** 
00049    * Get the  penalty for inbreeding levels the cel files that have been seen.
00050    * @return - vector of inbred covariates, one for each cel file in order seen.
00051    */
00052   std::vector<double> getInbredStatus() { return m_InbredStatus; }
00053 
00054 private:
00055     std::vector<double> m_InbredStatus;
00056   
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif /* FILEGENDERS_H */
